name: RecipeGram
description: This website lets the user share their favorite recipes or store secret recipes for their eyes only
tech: AWS S3, Handlebars, Express, MySQL, Sequelize, Node, Bootstrap

name: Food GeoLocation Search
description: This website helps the user find local breweries in their area with little to no effort. The users location is determined by their IP address.

name: JavaScript Quiz
description: Timed quiz to test the users JavaScript knowledge. Wrong answers are penalized with a deduction of points and time. High Scores are saved for motivation and bragging rights.

name: Team Profile Generator
description: This application uses terminal prompts to generate an HTML page with information cards for members of a team

name: Employee Tracker
description: This application allows a company to manage their employee data. They can add, update, and remove employees. They can also add or remove departments and positions within the company.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: Planner to help the user organize their daily activities
